reviewText: A gift that fit the bill.  No complaints.

This show has brought fun back into science,  showing that failures are as much a part of the learning process as successes.  I never get too much of them and by owning their dvd, I can watch it any time.

What is up with that $59.99 price?  That is twice as much as it costs on the Discovery site.  Is there any reason for that kind of a discrepancy?  The episodes are great (aside from the missing one), but that price...  Yeesh.  I can't give any product better than an average rating when it is decidedly a "gouge" pricing.

My copy DOES NOT contain the episode "30. Plane Boarding/Bite the Bullet".  It is a region 1 DVD for North America.  My understanding is that there is a legal dispute over this episode, but they ought to just remove it from the listing.

Aside from that disappointment, and the lack of any special features, this season is great.  Watching an RPG fire in high-speed is perhaps the best thing I've seen on TV, let alone Mythbusters.
Everything was ok shipping was fast and on time. And the product arrive in perfect condicion . The price was a little to high for a DVD , but know that this a rear item, the price become fair .
Terrific collection! New and fast shipping.
This set seems to have about 7 episodes missing in the time frame represented (2011 through 2012).  Otherwise, it is a good set of Mythbusters episodes.
some of this seasons episodes are not on this dvd set.
I love this show a lot. pricing was nice too.
Arrived Fast. Christmas gift for my son. He absolutely LOVED IT. This is ALL of the episodes for that season.
I don't get why the Hollywood Gunslingers episode's not on here.

Can't find these anywhere else but Amazon. Great price and so glad the seasons are available here! My son loves them! I will eventually purchase all of the seasons! Hopefully they will go on sale... :)
